item.title: 特朗普酝酿对毒品重新分类的报道引发大麻股飙升
item.description: 周一，有报道称唐纳德-特朗普总统正在考虑将大麻重新归类为危险性较低的毒品，大麻相关公司的股票随之大涨；这给该行业带来了急需的提振。【原文：Shares of cannabis-linked companies rallied on Monday after a report that President Donald Trump was considering reclassifying marijuana as a less dangerous drug — giving the sector a much needed boost.】

item.title: 市场再次恢复正常
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚回购 29 亿美元债券以减轻债务负担
item.description: 哥伦比亚在周五到期的招标中回购了面值 29 亿美元的主权债券，这是政府在加大支出的同时减轻债务负担战略的一部分。【原文：Colombia repurchased sovereign bonds with a face value of $2.9 billion in a tender offer that expired on Friday, part of the government’s strategy to ease the debt burden as it steps up spending.】

item.title: 福克斯和 ESPN 将以每月 40 美元的套餐提供流媒体服务
item.description: 沃尔特-迪斯尼公司（Walt Disney Co.【原文：Walt Disney Co.’s ESPN and Fox Corp. plan to offer a bundled package that will include both of their new streaming services for $40 a month.】

item.title: 瑞士再保险公司通过人寿政策建议应对长寿药物的影响
item.description: 瑞士再保险公司（Swiss Re AG）向承保人发布指南，指导他们如何评估有迹象表明为长寿目的使用药物的人的人寿保险申请。【原文：Swiss Re AG issued guidance for underwriters on how to assess life insurance applications of people who show signs of using medications for longevity purposes.】

item.title: 几内亚铁路被罢工的联合公司阻断俄罗斯铝业公司氧化铝工人
item.description: 俄罗斯联合公司（United Co.位于几内亚的俄罗斯铝业公司（Rusal）炼油厂的工人周一封锁了一条铁路，阻止从这个西非国家运出氧化铝，他们开始罢工，要求改善工作条件。【原文：Workers at Russia’s United Co. Rusal refinery in Guinea Monday blocked a railway to stop alumina shipments from the West African nation as they began a strike to demand better working conditions.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行认为，如果欧尔班在 2026 年投票中落败，福林将大幅上涨
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，如果匈牙利反对党在明年的大选中击败总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）领导的菲德斯党（Fidesz），福林的涨幅可能高达 5.5%。【原文：Barclays Plc said the forint could gain as much as 5.5% should Hungary’s opposition beat the Fidesz party of Prime Minister Viktor Orban in next year’s election.】

item.title: GitHub首席执行官将在激烈的人工智能竞争中离开微软
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）旗下 GitHub 的首席执行官即将卸任，这对于一个正努力应对程序员人工智能工具竞争日益激烈的编码平台来说是一个重大变化。【原文：The chief executive officer of Microsoft Corp.’s GitHub is stepping down, a major change for a coding platform grappling with increasing competition over AI tools for programmers.】

item.title: TransDigm 启动债务交易，向股东支付 43 亿美元
item.description: 根据一份监管文件，飞机零部件制造商 TransDigm Group Inc.【原文：Airplane-parts maker TransDigm Group Inc. launched a $4 billion debt offering on Monday to fund a roughly $4.3 billion special cash dividend to shareholders, according to a regulatory filing.】

item.title: Vontobel、Neuberger 从阿根廷地方债券走势中看到机会
item.description: 资金经理们纷纷涌入阿根廷当地市场，抓住比索和国内债券大幅下挫的机会，增加对该国资产的投资。【原文：Money managers are piling into Argentina’s local markets, seizing on the steep selloff in the peso and domestic bonds to increase exposure to the country’s assets.】

item.title: 美国银行因数据疲软和美联储风险下调美国利率展望
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）的利率策略师下调了国债收益率预期，因为他们预计近期的经济数据将促使美联储改变对风险的评估。【原文：Interest-rate strategists at Bank of America lowered Treasury yield forecasts in anticipation that recent economic data will drive a shift in the Federal Reserve’s assessment of risks.】

item.title: 花旗银行为信托基金监管 10 亿美元交易，而受制裁的寡头却隐匿利益
item.description:
文件详细说明了花旗集团在苏莱曼-克里莫夫（Suleiman Kerimov）于2018年受到制裁后继续与传统信托公司开展合法业务的努力。该银行表示，它的行为完全透明，并符合美国的法律法规。【原文：

Documents detail Citigroup’s efforts to continue to do lawful business with Heritage Trust after Suleiman Kerimov was sanctioned in 2018. The bank said it’s been fully transparent and acted in compliance with US laws and regulations.

】

item.title: 前生物技术公司筹资 15 亿美元囤积与特朗普有关的代币
item.description: 一家由生物技术公司转型为金融公司的公司正在寻求筹集高达 15 亿美元的资金，这笔交易将使该公司成为与特朗普有关的加密代币的储存商，为一个在经济上有利于总统家族的项目提供新的支撑。【原文：A biotech-turned-financial firm is seeking to raise up to $1.5 billion, in a deal that would transform it into a stockpiler of a Trump-tied crypto token, offering new ballast to a project that financially benefits the president’s family.】

item.title: 蓬勃发展的比特币进军老派投资俱乐部
item.description: 多年来，老气横秋的股票共同基金一直在流失现金，败给了价格更低、往往表现更好的替代基金。但现在，一个小众基金正在从新一代助推器中找到一条不太可能的生命线：比特币。【原文：Stodgy equity mutual funds have been bleeding cash for years, losing out to cheaper and often better-performing alternatives. But a niche subset are now finding an unlikely lifeline from a next-generation booster: Bitcoin.】

item.title: 姆巴迪说：肯尼亚的财政整顿不能再继续推进了
item.description: 肯尼亚财政部长在与国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）就一项新计划举行会谈前表示，肯尼亚计划在用尽财政整顿措施后转而采用私有化来刺激经济。【原文：Kenya plans to switch to privatization to stimulate the economy after exhausting fiscal consolidation, its Treasury secretary said, ahead of talks with the International Monetary Fund for a new program.】

item.title: 杰富瑞延长私人资本咨询部门的竞业禁止条款
item.description: 杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc. 临时收紧了其私人资本顾问团队的雇佣合同，以阻止竞争对手在二级市场繁荣的背景下挖走需求更大的人才。【原文：Jefferies Financial Group Inc. temporarily tightened employment contracts for its private capital advisory teams to discourage competitors from poaching talent that’s in greater demand amid a boom in the secondaries market.】

item.title: Rumble 公司和北方数据公司考虑以 45 亿美元的价格进行人工智能云合并
item.description: Rumble 公司正在权衡收购德国数据中心公司 Northern Data AG 的报价，该交易为全股票交易，目标公司估值约为 11.7 亿美元，这将推动这家保守的视频服务公司成为云计算提供商。【原文：Rumble Inc. is weighing an offer to buy German data center company Northern Data AG in an all-stock deal valuing the target at about $1.17 billion that would boost the conservative video service’s bid to become a cloud-computing provider.】

item.title: 挪威 1.9 万亿美元财富基金出售以色列资产
item.description: 挪威 1.9 万亿美元的主权财富基金已从 11 家以色列公司撤资，并正在终止与以色列外部管理人的所有合同，因为公众对该基金与加沙战争有关的投资表示强烈不满。【原文：Norway’s $1.9 trillion sovereign wealth fund has divested from 11 Israeli companies and is terminating all contracts with external managers in Israel following public outcry over its investments linked to the war in Gaza.】

item.title: 英特尔首席执行官将在总统要求辞职后与特朗普会面
item.description: 英特尔公司（Intel Corp.在特朗普要求陈立武辞职并指责他存在利益冲突四天后，英特尔公司首席执行官陈立武预计将与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普会面。【原文：Intel Corp. Chief Executive officer Lip-Bu Tan is expected to meet with US President Donald Trump, four days after Trump called for Tan’s resignation and accused him of having conflicts of interest.】

item.title: CVS 等 14 家公司在 CPI 报告前抢滩高端市场
item.description: 周一，CVS Health Corp. 和雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp.【原文：CVS Health Corp. and a unit of Chevron Corp. are among 14 firms offering US investment-grade bonds Monday, the most in three months, a day before heavily anticipated consumer-price data is due for release.】

item.title: 银行赢得金融科技公司 IntraFi 20 亿美元债务交易
item.description: 金融技术公司 IntraFi 在杠杆贷款市场上筹集了 20 多亿美元，标志着华尔街银行在与私人信贷公司的竞争中取得了胜利。【原文：Financial technology firm IntraFi raised more than $2 billion in the leveraged loan market, marking a win for Wall Street banks against private credit firms, which had discussed providing a debt package in recent months.】

item.title: 创始人手握商业计划书，开始寻找可销售的产品
item.description:
对于雷明顿-霍奇基斯（Remington Hotchkis）来说，想出一个从火灾中拯救家园的点子并不难。而确定一种他可以制造的实际产品则比较困难。【原文：

For Remington Hotchkis, devising an idea for saving homes from fires was the easy part. Identifying an actual product he could make was harder.

】

item.title: 波多黎各董事会解聘与 Prepa 破产纠纷纠缠不清
item.description: 波多黎各财政监督委员会的动荡正在延缓其电力公司的破产进程，因为监督此案的法官暂停了近期的申请截止日期，并要求提供委员会成员的最新情况。【原文：The upheaval of Puerto Rico’s financial oversight board is slowing down the bankruptcy of its power utility as the judge overseeing the case suspended a near-term filing deadline and asked for a status update on the board’s membership.】

item.title: 可可期货因担心西非作物减产而大涨
item.description: 可可期货攀升至12月以来的最高点，原因是人们对西非下一季作物产量预测疲软的担忧再度升温。【原文：Cocoa futures climbed the most since December amid renewed concern about weaker West African crop forecasts in the coming season.】

item.title: 投资者等待 CPI 数据确定美联储路线，美股走势低迷
item.description: 周一开盘后不久，美国股市变化不大，因为投资者在为本周的众多数据做准备，这些数据可能决定美联储恢复降息的速度。【原文：US stocks were little changed Monday soon after the open as investors geared up for a week filled with data that could determine how quickly the Federal Reserve resumes its interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: Prosus 48 亿美元的 Just Eat 交易获得欧盟有条件批准
item.description: Prosus NV 计划以 41 亿欧元（约合 48 亿美元）收购 Just Eat Takeaway.com，该计划已获得欧盟有条件批准，此前这家荷兰食品配送公司同意减持另一家竞争对手的股份，以消除对竞争的担忧。【原文：Prosus NV’s planned €4.1 billion ($4.8 billion) takeover of Just Eat Takeaway.com has won conditional approval from the European Union, after the Dutch food delivery firm agreed to reduce its stake in another rival to allay competition concerns.】

item.title: C3.ai 因 "不可接受 "的业绩和首席执行官的健康问题下跌 30
item.description: C3.ai Inc. 在盘前交易中暴跌 30%，原因是该软件公司因创始人的健康问题导致销售额大幅下滑。【原文：C3.ai Inc. tumbled 30% in premarket trading after a steep sales miss the software company attributed to its founder’s health issues.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油公司伏尔加河地区炼油厂遭袭后停止进油
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）旗下的萨拉托夫炼油厂在周日遭到无人机袭击后已停止进油。【原文：Russia’s Saratov refinery, owned by Rosneft PJSC, has stopped oil intake following a drone attack on Sunday, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 得克萨斯州机构警告：有毒页岩钻井废水威胁顶级油田
item.description: 德克萨斯州一个负责监管 1,300 万英亩州属土地的机构警告说，页岩钻探产生的有毒废液有可能污染北美最多产原油盆地的油井。【原文：A Texas agency overseeing 13 million acres of state land is warning that toxic waste fluid from shale drilling threatens to contaminate oil wells in North America’s most prolific crude basin.】

item.title: 富国银行顶级股票策略师 Chris Harvey 离职
item.description: 富国银行证券有限责任公司（Wells Fargo Securities LLC）股票策略主管克里斯托弗-哈维（Christopher Harvey）已离开公司。【原文：Christopher Harvey, head of equity strategy for Wells Fargo Securities LLC, has left the firm.】
